sections.name: Scanning title
sections.html:
Hosts exhibiting scanning behaviour

The hosts below could be performing scans of other hosts. A host could also be in this table if it just contacts lots of other hosts - eg if it is a network management application.

sections.name: Scanning

variables.select: sourceAddress, resolve("Source name", sourceAddress), count("Number of destinations", sourceAddress, destinationAddress)

sections.name: DDOS title
sections.html:
Potential DDOS victims

The hosts below could be victims of a Distributes Denial of Service attack. A host could also be in this table if it contacted by lots of other hosts - eg if it is a web server.

sections.name: DDOS

variables.select: destinationAddress, resolve("Destination name", destinationAddress), count("Number of sources", sourceAddress, destinationAddress)
